metadata.title: Robbers kill youth in Lakki Marwat

content.article_body: PESHAWAR, Jan 12 (APP):A youth was killed while resisting during a robbery in Nar Haidaran area, in the vicinity of Sarai Naurang police station in Lakki Marwat district on Sunday. Police said unknown robbers shot dead a youth, identified as Qadar Khan when he resisted during the robbery. Body of the deceased was shifted to Tehsil Headquarters Hospital for medico legal procedure. Police have registered a case and started a search for the robbers.
